MERGE INTO USER_DIET_TYPE t USING (SELECT #{userId} AS USER_ID FROM dual) s ON (t.USER_ID = s.USER_ID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PROTEIN_TYPE = #{dto.proteinType}, FAT_TYPE = #{dto.fatType}, CARB_TYPE = #{dto.carbType}, DIET_TYPE = #{dietType}, UPDATED_AT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID, PROTEIN_TYPE, FAT_TYPE, CARB_TYPE, DIET_TYPE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{dto.proteinType}, #{dto.fatType}, #{dto.carbType}, #{dietType})
